price: 28. Waxay (raciyadii ku) odhan (madaxdoodii): Waxaad nooga iman jirteen dhanka midig5.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
footnotes: 5. Idinkoo noo diidaya ku dhaqanka wanaagga iyo diinta oo xoog noo sheeganaya.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū innakum kuntum tatūnanā ʿani al-yamīni
